casebody.data:
IN RE MGR, Minor. SC: 157821
COA: 338286, 340203 Supreme Court of Michigan. November 16, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion to extend the time for filing the brief amicus curiae of the Academy of Adoption and Assisted Reproduction Attorneys is GRANTED. The amicus brief submitted on November 9, 2018, is accepted for filing.
